name: revolt-chatbot
description: Real-time conversational voice interface using Gemini Live API for Revolt Motors

scripts.frontend:start: cd frontend && npm run build && serve -s build -l 3000
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test-api: curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/api/test-message -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"message\":\"Hello, tell me about Revolt Motors\"}"

author: Your Name
